dc_description_s: South Africa Miscellaneous Facilities and Land Use, 2014 is a polygon theme representing land usage in South Africa.  Atrributes include the feature type (bird sanctuary, botanical garden, caravan park, cemetery, container depot, drive in theather, garden, golf course, golf driving range, grave, high urban density, holiday resort, low urban density, military camp, park, recreation area, refuse dump, rifle range, zoo). The source material is a 1:50,000 topgraphical map series. The original shapefile was originally created in tiles and were merged together by Columbia Libraries, the original map sheet for each feature is included in the attribute table.
dc_title_s: South Africa Miscellaneous Facilities and Land Use, 2014
